author: Tom Warren
title: Microsoft to prioritize cloud access for first responders and emergency services
description: Microsoft will prioritize critical infrastructure, first responders, and emergency services for access to its Azure cloud services. The commitment comes amid the ongoing coronavirus pandemic, as web-based services are seeing significant increases in demand.
content:
If there are capacity issues, then Microsoft has a priority plan
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Microsoft is planning to prioritize access to its cloud-based Azure services to first responders, emergency services, and critical infrastructure if the… [+1777 chars]
